DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to describe the disease status based on criteria not listed elsewhere.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: In medicine, an improvement related to treatment.

Concepts.definition: The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Evaluation; the act of placing value on something.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCISTD: NCI CRF Harmonization and Standards Initiative

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Depletion of stem cells in the bone marrow that results in the lack of production of hematopoietic cells.

Concepts.definition: Depletion of stem cells in the bone marrow that results in the lack of production of hematopoietic cells.
